Samples: In tests performed we used 1000G (tasks with 2.5k participants) and TOPMed freeze5 datasets (tasks with 10k or more participants). All these tests are done with applied MAF < 1% filter. There are 70 mio variants with MAF <= 1% in 1000G and 460 mio in TOPMed freeze5 dataset. Typically, aggregate tests only use a subset of these variants; e.g. grouped by gene. Computational performance will vary depending on how many total variants are tested, and how many variants are included in each aggregation unit.
